title: Got this wierd problem with audio on my pixel 2xl
content: I cannot listen the audio in apps. The device audio is totally fine. But when I open to play some kind of games like pubg or subway surfers,,I can't really hear any kind of audio until and unless I plugged in my earphones..it's not only for the games but also for the whatsApp voice messages where I can't listen to the voice messages which were sent even by me myself until and unless I plugged in my earphones.. and it's only been 4 months since I bought it......and this problem just kicked in like from 2 days need an solution ASAP......
